text: No Easy Way Down may refer to: * "No Easy Way Down", a song from Hour Glass's self-titled 1967 album, later sung by other artists, including Dusty Springfield in Dusty in Memphis (1969) and the song's co-writer Carole King in Writer (1970) * "No Easy Way Down", a song from Explosions in the Glass Palace (1984) by Rain Parade
title: No Easy Way Down
